remarks: The zero vector of the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualv0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ldualv0.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualv0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
ldualv0.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualv0.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` D ) $.
ldualv0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldual0v $p |- ( ph -> O = ( V X. { .0. } ) ) $.
